name: Hermesh
description:
A small Metroidvania was built for Ludum Dare 52 in 72 hours. Theme: Harvest.  LDJam site entry

You play as Hermesh, a reaper apprentice.

Harvest escaped souls from possessed ducks to gain new abilities and access to new areas!

Credits: Sahar Zehavi,  Ido Adler Ori Bruslovsky Shaked Lotan

Build with Godot game engine.
